Background (Information): 

 The CoffeeShop was founded in 2020 with the prime 

 goal of serving the best coffee in the local area. 

 Our objective is our customer satisfaction through 

 the quality products that we serve to our great 

 customers.We belive in freshness of things that 

 we serve :)
